Thinking about all of our brave service-members this Christmas. I know it is so difficult to be away from your loved-ones this time of year. You make our nation proud and we are grateful for the sacrifices you and your families make to keep us safe.

To all who celebrate: Merry Christmas. 

May the reason for the season inspire us to celebrate redeeming, unconditional love and also practice it. 

May we serve the poor, relieve suffering, welcome the stranger, visit the imprisoned & love our neighbor (we are all neighbors).
